name: @touch4it/ng_eslint_rulezz
description: ESLint rules for Angular projects defined for Touch4IT projects.

scripts.publish:t4i: npm run npm_prepublish && npm publish --registry https://npm.touch4.it
scripts.publish:public: npm run npm_prepublish && npm publish --access public
scripts.npm_prepublish: rm -rf node_modules && rm package-lock.json && npm i

author: Touch4IT
